svg.text: 4-20mA Pressure Sensor — Dwyer 626 CB Wiring Detail
Based on Dwyer 626/628 CB Option instruction manual — accurate terminal mapping
2-Wire Current Loop Wiring — Dwyer 626 CB Option
PSU V+ → VIN (#1) → [sensor] → COM (#2) → A0602 CH+(in) → CH−(out) → PSU V−

g.text: Range: 0-5 PSI | Output: 4-20mA (CB option) | Supply: 10-35 VDC
Accuracy: ±0.25% BFSL | Process: 1/4" NPT male | Wetted: 316L SS
Note: Term #3 (Vo) is voltage output — leave unconnected when using CB (current) mode
Ref: Dwyer 626/628 Instruction Manual, CB Option
• Vo (Term #3) is for voltage output — leave disconnected for 4-20mA mode
• Use shielded cable for runs > 10 ft; connect shield to Term #4

svg.text: TankAlarm 112025 | Dwyer 626 CB 4-20mA Wiring Detail | Ref: Dwyer 626/628 CB Option Manual | Rev 1.1 Feb 2026
